channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Mujltiple paving slabs broken again - large gaps with potential to start damaging tyres, 28th March
item.description:
Outside 4 cowley close driveway entrance

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Cowley Close, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The Traffic light (for vehicles going into town) stays on Red if the cars are only coming from one side (towards town). They only become green after another car approaches from the opposite side (from town towards tewksbury road). I have always struggled at night time because it just doesn't change for minutes on end, 28th March
item.description:
The Traffic lights on High street going into town (outside Newsagents/before the Parking) It has been an issue for a very long time. I travel by night often and get stuck here for minutes on end until a car comes from the opposite side.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Poole Way, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Lights are red for no reason

item.title: The Traffic Light gives default way to people coming from Lidl. The main swindon road traffic light stays red as default and only changes green after approx 30 seconds of waiting, despite Lidl being closed and no traffic coming from there., 28th March
item.description:
The traffic lights on the Lidl Crossroad including the traffic lights out of Lidl and the Traffic lights on the Main Road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Swindon Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Lights are red for no reason

item.title: Parking too close to junction and parking on corner of pavement, 28th March
item.description:
Something needs to be done about this before an accident happen. Double lines? Also road pillars on pavement to stop cars parking on the pavement. As it restricted the view to see cars from the junction.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 37, Willowleaze, Longlevens, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road markings, lines and stud issues

item.title: 98 meadowleaze, 28th March
item.description:
Someone keeps parking their car in front of 98 meadowleaze. The car is blocking their 2 cars in the drive. It’s difficult to parking along our house next to their house while the car parking out of their house. As we don’t got a drive and next door to us parking on road as well.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 100, Meadowleaze, Longlevens, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sign has been keeping moved to point facing the field, 28th March
item.description:
Person/people has been moving the sign to facing forward the field, therefore people can’t see the sign. I has been moving the sign back around so it is showing the cars on the road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Greyhound Gardens, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Sign has been vandalised (Non illuminating sign)

item.title: 50mph speed traffic signs along A436 between Withington north road and Seven Springs roundabout are obscured by mud/dirt, 27th March
item.description:
There wasn't a dropdown option for this, but I have noticed that all the speed traffic signs (50mph) along the A436 between the Withington north road and Seven Springs roundabout are very dirty and difficult to read. The sign I have tried to flag on the map near the entrance to Pegglesworth is almost totally obscured by mud. As there are so many accidents along this road I believe the road signs should be cleaned as a matter of urgency. Many thanks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester Road, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Sign has been vandalised (Non illuminating sign)
